changeSet.author: tkopacki
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE EJB__TIMER__TBL ( `CREATIONTIMERAW` BIGINT NOT NULL, `BLOB` BLOB, `TIMERID` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `CONTAINERID` BIGINT NOT NULL, `OWNERID` VARCHAR(255) NULL, `STATE` INTEGER NOT NULL, `PKHASHCODE` INTEGER NOT NULL, `INTERVALDURATION` BIGINT NOT NULL, `INITIALEXPIRATIONRAW` BIGINT NOT NULL, `LASTEXPIRATIONRAW` BIGINT NOT NULL, `SCHEDULE` VARCHAR(255) NULL, `APPLICATIONID` BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT `PK_EJB__TIMER__TBL` PRIMARY KEY (`TIMERID`) );
